TopicTitle: [BUG] EAS-1 External Command Seat thumbnail doesn't show up in R&D Tree

Articles.Content:
**SP Version:** v1.0.1 Windows 8.1 64 bit

**What Happens:** EAS-1 External Command Seat Thumbnail doesn't show up in R&D Tree

**Mods / Add-Ons:** All Stock

**Steps to Replicate:**

Go to R&D centre (upgrade 2?)

Navigate to Field Science

Look at first thumbnail of external command seat

Conclude that the image is missing

Put on confused face

**Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:**
